entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor: add a @bind-value:before event #54916
  • Perf regression: plaintext #54909
  • Perf improvement: fortunes #54908
  • ForwardedHeadersMiddleware isn't setting X-Original-Proto correctly #54904
  • Custom JSON converter does not respect passed options for conversion. #54901
  • [WebToolsE2E][ARM64]Failed to run .exe file with error "System.AccessViolationException: Attempted to read or write protected memory" from publish folder after publishing .NET 8.0 project against self-contained with single file #54899
  • Embiggen ASP.NET Core development exception page text #54896
  • Quickgrid footer missing #54895
  • Improve wrapping of values on ASP.NET Core development exception page #54894

Closed

  • Blazor WebAssembly dotnet watch run --pathbase=/ doesn't work in .NET 8 #52294
    8.0.x
  • IHttpContextAccessor is null #53143
  • Items dictionary is always empty in SignalR hub HttpContext #53569
  • Perf improvement: connectionclose, json #54898
  • One Dll File In Wasm #54888
  • Cannot submit the form because no form on the page currently has that name. #54854
  • Blazor Server memory analyzer tool? #54902
  • user-jwts cannot handle comments in JSON secrets.json, and does not inform which file is the problem #54814
  • InputText crash if mistyped attribute #54852
  • Extend Blazor for source generator to perform service injection instead of built-in reflection #54857
  • Route values are missing in SignalR hub HttpContext #53566
  • Perf improvement: mapaction, single_query #54883
  • Blazor Server Standard Module Authentication Issue on .NET 8 Environment #54892
  • RoutePatternAnalyzer (ASP0017, ASP0018) performance issue (1.5 minute execution time) #53899

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0] Suppress .ps1 SDL errors #54915
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 8.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Suppress .ps1 SDL errors #54914
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • [release/8.0] Backport test fixes #54912
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 8.0.x
  • Support generating OpenAPI operation and associated fields #54903
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • Fix developer exception page showing duplicate endpoint metadata #54893
    area-middleware

Merged

  • [release/6.0] Don't build Node components in SourceBuild #54913
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.30
  • [release/8.0] Fix route analyzer performance with highly concatenated strings #54763
    Servicing-approved, area-minimal, 8.0.5
  • [release/8.0] Improve usage of `Type.GetType` when activating types in data protection #54762
    area-dataprotection, Servicing-approved, 8.0.5
  • [release/8.0] Preserve RemoteAuthenticationContext during trimming if used in JS interop #54655
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 8.0.5
  • [release/7.0] Reduce helix-matrix timeout to 5 hours #54777
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 7.0.19
  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `31993df` to `77afe8e` #54869
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.30
  • [release/8.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `31993df` to `77afe8e` #54872
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 8.0.5
  • [release/8.0] Reduce helix-matrix timeout to 5 hours #54778
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 8.0.5
  • [release/6.0] Reduce helix-matrix timeout to 5 hours #54779
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.30
  • Increase logs and delays in CanLaunchPhotinoWebViewAndClickButton #54608
    area-blazor, tell-mode, 8.0.5
  • [release/8.0] Convert to 1ES templates #54660
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 8.0.5
  • [release/7.0] Convert to 1es templates #54853
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 7.0.19
  • [release/6.0] Convert to 1ES templates #54656
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.30
  • Update branding to 6.0.30 #54905
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.30
  • Update branding to 7.0.19 #54906
    area-infrastructure, 7.0.19
  • Update branding to 8.0.5 #54907
    area-infrastructure, 8.0.5
  • Update milestones for May #54910
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview4
  • update IdentityModel to latest #54601
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Handle JSON comments and trailing commas in user-jwts #54826
    area-commandlinetools, community-contribution
  • Use SearchValues throughout dotnet/aspnetcore (part 2) #54804
    Perf, community-contribution, area-networking, 9.0-preview4
  • Support resolving OpenApiPaths entries from document #54847
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • Update .NET SDK to 9.0.100-preview.4.24201.1 #54868
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:, 9.0-preview4

Updated

  • Change how ANCM recycles app #52807
    feature-iis, area-networking
  • Include ContentLength when enumerating HttpHeaders #54760
    area-networking
  • Add custom message to NavigationException #54862
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `31993df` to `77afe8e` #54866
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 7.0.x
  • Use SearchValues throughout dotnet/aspnetcore (part 3) #54878
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Introduce a logger provider that counts warnings and errors #54846
    area-dataprotection
